body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Start a Duel
2. Start a game
3. Sometime you get asked if you want to Mulligan, sometimes not..

What is the expected output? 
Ask at the start of every game if you want to Mulligan. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.26 on WinXP SP3 32-bit
author: [Jak1...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/112622755219524898050/)
title: option to Mulligan not in every game

comments.body:
Thanks for the report.

The option to take a mulligan is disabled when using generated decks. This is because generated decks use a smart shuffle routine that makes sure you get a decent opening hand.

**Status:** WontFix
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)
